DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective clinical trial determine treatment ubiquinol , form coenzyme Q10 , improve physical function men woman Veterans suffer Gulf War Illness ( GWI ) . The primary outcome measure change baseline Short Form Health Survey 36-item ( SF-36 ) , respect physical functioning symptom . DOC.detailed_description: As many third nearly 700,000 military personnel deploy Desert Shield Desert Storm ( Aug 2 , 1990 July 31 , 1991 ) Kuwaiti Theater Operations suffer Gulf War Illness ( GWI ) , unexplained chronic illness characterize multiple symptom . Gulf War Veterans experience environmental exposure know oxidative stressor contribute cell injury , result mitochondrial dysfunction Exploratory study use intervention support cell function prevent repair stress mediator suggest role target intervention , Coenzyme Q10 . The goal clinical trial determine Coenzyme Q10 effective increase physical functioning Veterans Gulf War Illness . This randomize , two group , double blind , placebo control , Phase III clinical trial . The treatment group receive ( 2x200 mg 2 month 1x200 mg 4 month ) day ubiquinol 6 month . The placebo group receive match placebo ( 2x200 mg 2 month 1x200 mg 4 month ) day ubiquinol 6 month . The primary outcome measure clinical trial change baseline SF-36 , respect physical functioning symptom . The secondary outcome measure include change baseline peripheral blood level biomarkers , GWI-associated symptoms chronic pain , fatigue , sleep issue , cognitive impairment .
DOC.criteria: Male female Veterans deploy 1990 1991 Gulf War . Veterans currently meet Kansas Gulf War Study Case Definition Gulf War Illness . Veterans good health base medical history prior 1990 . Veterans whose severity illness moderate severe , evidence score less 30 100 physical domain SF36 . Veteran condition may interfere ability accurately report symptom , : severe psychiatric problem posttraumatic stress disorder ( PTSD ) schizophrenia bipolar disorder major depression psychotic melancholic feature delusional disorder alcohol drug dependence require hospitalization , regular illegal drug use psychiatric condition require inpatient stay 6 month prior study entry . Has dementias type Currently exclusionary condition could reasonably responsible symptom multisymptom disorder , determine Investigator ( base Reeves et al.2003 ) . Is pregnant breastfeed plan become pregnant within next 6 month . Medical condition exclude : organ failure define rheumatologic inflammatory disorder chronic active infection HIV , hepatitis B C , transplant primary sleep disorder Medications could potentially impact immune function exclude : steroid immunesuppressives nutraceuticals formulate impact mitochondrial function oxidative stress Biologic response modifier within 3 month study entry . Current use Coumadin ( give vitamin K structural similarity CoQ10 ) Known allergy CoQ10 and/or inactive ingredient active placebo soft gelatin capsule Willingness 12 week washout current CoQ10 , ubiquinol , ubiquinone supplement require screen baseline visit .
